content: please note before purchase that this is a pdf file and not a physical item this pdf pattern is used to create the dinosaur shown above in whatever different colors you like and any you could imagine details this pattern requires 3 50mm crochet hook 4 ply worsted weight yarn in two or more colors stuffing 8mm safety eyes in black or desired color you will receive 1 pdf file with instructions on how to create a 6 dinosaur plush toy should you find any issues with the pattern or simply need advice or instructions please contact us instagram com/melimooncrochet facebook com/melimooncrochet
